item.title: Kaiju No. 8 Season 2 Reveals Teaser Trailer and Gen Narumi Visual
item.description: Kaiju No. 8 Season 2 has released a teaser trailer and new character visual featuring Gen Narumi. Studio Production I.G returns to produce the anime with confirmed global streaming on Crunchyroll.
